ScriptItemPortable.SourceCode:
def Load(widget): if widget.Entity == None: return
status = widget.Entity["STATUS"].GetInt32()
podeEditar = False habilitado = False if (status == 1): podeEditar = False habilitado = False elif (status == 2): podeEditar = False habilitado = False elif (status == 3): podeEditar = True habilitado = True elif (status == 4): podeEditar = False habilitado = False elif (status == 5): podeEditar = True habilitado = False
widget.View.Commands["CMD_PROCESSAR"].Visible = habilitado widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = podeEditar widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = podeEditar
